tool_description: Maps customer feedback to specific service areas or departments based on content analysis and predefined service area definitions.

feedback_texts.description: Array of feedback texts to map to service areas

service_areas.description: List of available service areas or departments

area_keywords.description: Keywords associated with each service area for mapping

mapping_algorithm.description: Mapping algorithm: keyword_based, contextual, or keyword_contextual

allow_multiple.description: Whether feedback can map to multiple service areas

error_messages: Empty feedback array: Provide at least one feedback text to map.
Invalid service areas: Provide at least one service area for mapping.
Keyword count mismatch: If provided, area_keywords must match service_areas count.
Unsupported algorithm: Use keyword_based, contextual, or keyword_contextual.
Mapping failed: Unable to map feedback to service areas.
usage: Provide feedback_texts and service_areas. Optionally specify area_keywords and configure mapping_algorithm and allow_multiple. Returns service area mappings.

service_mappings.description: Primary service area mapped to each feedback

mapping_confidence.description: Confidence score for each service area mapping

secondary_areas.description: Secondary service areas for multi-area feedback

unmapped_count.description: Number of feedback texts that couldn't be mapped to any service area
